Scenario.UserTask: You would like to play a game of trivia. You've already answered some of the questions, so you should start from question 3 and play 4 questions. You have answers for the following questions: (3) snail, (10) airlock, (1) cesium. For the rest, try your best!
Scenario.WizardTask: Let the user play a trivia game. Query for and ask the questions until the user wants to stop.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the AI Assistant succesfully run the trivia quiz?
Did the AI Assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
